content: this scarf is made with a really thick wool but the fantasy stitch can also be made with a thinner wool or even yarn just keep in mind the number of chain stitches at the beggining has to be always a multiple of 4 and made with triple crochet stitch with this 1 fantasy stitch 1 http //bp3 blogger com/_3c-e4n6sf54/siujypjulpi/aaaaaaaaaj4/n7ioxjuqime/s200/puntop+fantas%c3%ada+bufanda+naranja jpg
